name: Project Overnet
description:
The digital frontier known as the Overnet beckoned with its alluring mysteries when the enigmatic genius Cybermask stumbled upon a portal to this new dimension. The energy readings inside were off the charts. He realized this one-in-a-lifetime discovery promised infinite possibilities of reshaping reality, and soon, he proceeded to create the Zero Opacity Institute to assemble a diverse group of individuals, giving birth to Project Overnet.

Project Overnet entails a journey into the new dimension where these individuals will engage in a group of strategic combats called Transfer Battles, controlling their M.I.N.D (Multi-Interface Neural Deck) and becoming OverKnights, avatars made of Neurodata.

Now is your chance to be part of history. Test your abilities, and rise to the top to become the first OverKnight.

The future of the Overnet realm rests upon your shoulders!



- Control your M.I.N.D wielding concepts to discharge opponents, erase their energy points, and defeat them, making them transfer to the real world.



- Card effects only activate after you master a pattern challenge. It's not just about strategy, it's about executing your moves flawlessly!



- Become a Legend! Rise on top of the Transfer Battles and prove yourself worthy of becoming an OverKnight.

Your trial begins now!
